body_html:
Nice find @zhaolili -- I'm tempted to close this bug since it's not TensorFlow-specific, it seems.

(It would be good to know if TensorFlow is somehow hitting unique bugs in the driver that others aren't, so if anyone wants to validate that other GPU software works fine before trying to update to the correct device driver, that would be useful debugging info for the future).

body:
Nice find @zhaolili -- I'm tempted to close this bug since it's not TensorFlow-specific, it seems.

(It would be good to know if TensorFlow is somehow hitting unique bugs in the driver that others aren't, so if anyone wants to validate that other GPU software works fine before trying to update to the correct device driver, that would be useful debugging info for the future).
